sentences.en: a ban on the dumping of radioactive waste at sea
sentences.cn: 禁止向海里倾倒放射性废物

sentences.en: All dumping of sludge will be banned by 1998.
sentences.cn: 从1998年起，将禁止所有倾倒淤泥的行为。

sentences.en: Chapter Three discusses anti - dumping investigation, anti - dumping measures in procedure rules.
sentences.cn: 第三章论述了程序规则中的 反 倾销调查 、 反 倾销措施及反规避措施等问题.

sentences.en: Chapter V Duration and Review of Anti - dumping duties and price undertakings.
sentences.cn: 第五章 反 倾销税和价格承诺的期限与复审?

sentences.en: Dumping thousands of gallons of water in the middle of a drought is news.
sentences.cn: 在干旱期间每天排放成千加仑的水会是一条新闻的.

sentences.en: Eastern Europe is rapidly becoming a dumping-ground for radioactive residues.
sentences.cn: 东欧迅速成为放射性残渣的倾倒场。

sentences.en: German law forbids the dumping of hazardous waste on German soil.
sentences.cn: 德国法律禁止在德国本土倾倒有害废料。

sentences.en: He found out they were dumping water and trying to cover it up.
sentences.cn: 他发现他们在放水.他们试图想掩盖这件事.

sentences.en: It will rip the EBOOT dumping and decrypting what it can.
sentences.cn: 这将撕裂通过解密EBOOT和倾销所能.

sentences.en: Manufacturer reported facing financial difficulty and dumping stock product unbind sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 据报道制造商财政困难,故不惜亏本抛售库存.

sentences.en: She was awfully thick - skinned about dumping her boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 她遗弃了男朋友,真够无心无肺的.

sentences.en: The company is dumping its goods.
sentences.cn: 该公司在廉价倾销它的货物.

sentences.en: The dumping of foreign cotton blocked outlets for locally grown cotton.
sentences.cn: 外国棉花的倾销阻滞了当地生产的棉花的销路.

sentences.en: The GATT permits countries to levy anti - dumping duties if their industries are or might be injured.
sentences.cn: 关税及贸易总协定允许各国在其工业受到或可能受到损害时征收倾销税.

sentences.en: The government has promised to stop dumping by the state-owned chemical plants.
sentences.cn: 政府已保证停止国营化工厂的倾倒行为。

sentences.en: The land is generally too expensive for us as a dumping area for gypsum.
sentences.cn: 把地面用来作为石膏的倾倒场所一般说来是太浪费了.

sentences.en: We dumped our bags at the nearby Grand Hotel and hurried toward the market.
sentences.cn: 我们把包扔在附近的格兰德旅馆，急匆匆地向市场赶去。

words.tran_cn: [车辆] 自动倾卸车；倾卸者；清洁工人

phrases.tran_cn: n. 卸泥区；堆填区；倾卸区；倾倒物料区
n. 垃圾堆积场；倾卸场
倾销幅度；倾销差价，倾销差额
垃圾堆积场；卸泥区；倾弃场

trans.tran_en: the act of getting rid of dangerous waste material in a place that is not safe

trans.tran_cn: 倾倒( dump的现在分词 )，丢下，随便堆放，释放
trans.tran_en: If you dump something somewhere, you put it or unload it there quickly and carelessly
